dct_title_s: Spherical chart of part of the coast of Peru, from the parallel of 7⁰ to 21⁰ 45' south latitude : surveyed and drawn by order of the king of Spain in the year 1790
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures; depths shown by soundings. Engraved by: T. Foot. Includes six coastal profiles. Historic Maps copy has ms. annotations.
dct_publisher_sm: London : Republished ... by W. Faden, geographer to his majesty, and to his royal highness the Prince of Wales, Charing Cross, Augt. 12th 1805.
